item.title: 查到篇国外PUA原版资料，宅宅们可借鉴，妹子也要看看防骗[50-100]
item.description:
查到篇国外PUA原版资料，宅宅们可借鉴，妹子也要看看防骗 本帖最后由 双页宅 于 2019-5-27 18:43 编辑
My name is Virgin, I am an artist, a pick-up artist, I am hired for women to fulfill their fantasies, their deep dark fantasies (Tall, Rich, and Handsome men). I was going to be an honest man, you know, was devoting and genuflecting. After a hundred or two cuckolds and small contempt, you know, I decided that I had enough, then I ceded into PUA.
The women requested a lot of fetishes,so...I just decided to go...um, you know, for love master, and change my whole loveinto dungeon, um...love dungeon master, now with the full dungeon, in my plan.And it's going really well
PUA lessons are 300 bucks. And uh usually the target is pretty much high on a popper to get to really get informed, you know I have this long gold chain to my neck, and uh then I put on afake Vacheron Constantin up to wrest. Then just wear make-up, and uh it's a longprocess, for manipulating.
You know, to get your whole armored up. Some women are tough. It's an tense feeling for each other, I think for myself tooit's em…… you're going places that um even though its physical with your hand, butsome reason it's also emotional, more psychological too. And we both go, you know, reach the same place. It's really strange at the same time. And after asession like that, I get really exhausted from it at the end.
I don't know if I feel kind of...um naked, causeI am looking at myself for the first time I think, well, not myself, but this aspect of my life for the first time. And it's...man gosh! Three to five years already? And I've never thought about it.
Hmmm. kind of sad, I feel kind of sad right now.
先贴个摘要，主要讲了一些PUA经历和经验，不过作者最后似乎有些悔恨这一切。希望广泛传播，提醒一下好奇的男生和单纯的女生们。
item.content:encoded:
wuwao_1:
spoony 发表于 2019-5-29 13:16
不看钱就是装有趣的人 没趣的人怎么装有趣呢 我过去有趣 但是因为种种原因现在不能有趣了 就这么简单
同 ...
如果是你情我愿，陌陌探探那种其实无所谓，包括搭讪干一炮，419。
但是PUA可恨的地方在于欺骗。这个是重点。
P.S.PUA主要就是教人们怎么装有趣，而不是说以前多有趣。但是问题不在于有不有趣，而是 装 这个事情本身，是欺骗。
